title: Accuair airride system complete for sale

posts.content:
Possibly for sale a complete accuair airride system from my single cab ( been featured by volksworld December issue).
Everything is there to transfer to your bus. It is a top of the range system with self leveling sensors, wifi connection to control from your phone, twin compressors, high quality air lines. Comes with everything.
Almost instant lift 140mm
All parts seen no more then 500 miles, does looks and works as brand new. Costed in excess of 10000 gbp
I don't think there is a better system on the market!
Will take 6k
Still on the single cab so can be seen working
Pic of the bus with system

One off set of 17" two piece wheels with tyres can be sold as a package with airride to compete setup.
Wheels are made in uk by my design and there only one set in the world. Fronts are 4.5" rears 7"
Valves are from inside, caps are stainless steel and are removable
I can install system into your bus if needed
Parts are definitely for sale, open to offers!

short video of the system on the bus if somebody interested to buy it.
all parts removed from the bus now.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdXtTJt ... e=youtu.be
